name: Project 21
description:
Project 21 is a 2d platformer game with enigma playable to 2 player for a best experience or alone. 

The players incarnates 2 characters:

- A soldier with a grapnel and a rifle.

- A scientist with a tesla rifle.

Players need to combine their skill to beat enigma and battle levels.
